    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_112661</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thomson's cathode ray tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kathodenstrahlröhre Thomsons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tube cathodique de Thomson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tubo de raio de cátodo de Thomson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tubo a raggi catodici del Thomson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σωλήνας ακτίνων καθόδων Thomson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tubo catódico de Thomson</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the cathode ray tube conceptualised by Joseph Thomson. Electrons moving from the hot cathode pass through the slits in the anode.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cathode ray tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cathode rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">CRT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Joseph Thomson</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Kathodenstrahlröhre, 
die von Joseph Thomson aufgefaßt wird. Die Elektronen, die von 
der heißen Kathode bewegen, überschreiten durch die Schlitze in der 
Anode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le tube cathodique 
conceptualisé par Joseph Thomson. Les électrons se déplaçant
de la cathode chaude traversent les fentes dans l'anode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o tubo de raio de 
cátodo conceptualised por Joseph Thomson. Os elétrons que 
movem-se do cátodo quente passam através das réguas no ânodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il tubo a raggi 
catodici concettualizzato da Joseph Thomson. Gli elettroni che 
si muovono dal catodo caldo attraversano le fessure nell'anodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σωλήνα ακτίνων καθόδων 
που αντιλαμβάνεται από Joseph Thomson. Τα ηλεκτρόνια 
που κινούνται από την καυτή κάθοδο περνούν μέσω των σχισμών 
στην άνοδο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el tubo catódico 
conceptuado por José Thomson. Los electrones que se mueven 
desde el cátodo caliente pasan a través de las rajas en el ánodo.</string>
          </description>
